fill_floor ("fl-leavesb", 0, 0, levelw, levelh) set_actor ("ac-blackball", 2.5, 6.5) document (1, 6, "text1") document (18, 6, "text2")
if difficult then mines = 36 else mines = 24 end
score = 14 * 11 - mines
mine_map = {} xx = {} yy = {}
winnable = 1
function init_mines () for i = 1, 14 do mine_map[i] = {} for j = 1, 11 do mine_map[i][j] = 0 end end for n = 1, mines do local i, j repeat i = random (2, 13) j = random (2, 10) until mine_map[i][j] == 0 xx[n] = i+2 yy[n] = j+0 mine_map[i][j] = 1 end end
function reachable () local a = {} local m = 14 * 11 local oldm
for i = 1, 14 do a[i] = {} for j = 1, 11 do a[i][j] = 0 if i < 3 or i > 12 or j < 3 or j > 9 then m = m - 1 a[i][j] = 1 end end end
repeat oldm = m for i = 2, 13 do for j = 2, 10 do if mine_map[i][j] == 0 and a[i][j] == 1 then if a[i-1][j] == 0 then m = m - 1 end if a[i+1][j] == 0 then m = m - 1 end if a[i][j-1] == 0 then m = m - 1 end if a[i][j+1] == 0 then m = m - 1 end a[i-1][j] = 1 a[i+1][j] = 1 a[i][j-1] = 1 a[i][j+1] = 1 end end end until m == oldm
return (m == 0) end
repeat init_mines () until reachable ()
floors = { "fl-white", -- 0 "fl-bluegray", -- 1 "fl-black", -- 2 "fl-red", -- 3 "fl-sahara", -- 4 "fl-rough-blue", -- 5 "fl-rough-red", -- 6 "fl-himalaya", -- 7 "fl-abyss_fake" -- 8 }
function mine_at (i, j) if i < 1 or j < 1 or i > 14 or j > 11 then return 0 else return mine_map[i][j] end end
for i = 1, 14 do local x = i+2 for j = 1, 11 do local y = j local n = 1 n = n + mine_at (i-1, j-1) n = n + mine_at (i+1, j-1) n = n + mine_at (i-1, j+1) n = n + mine_at (i+1, j+1) n = n + mine_at (i, j-1) n = n + mine_at (i, j+1) n = n + mine_at (i-1, j) n = n + mine_at (i+1, j) n = n + mine_at (i, j) set_floor (floors[n], x, y, {friction=4.0, mousefactor=1.5})
if mine_map[i][j] == 0 then set_item ("it-trigger", x, y, {action="callback", target="cb_uncover"}) else set_item ("it-trigger", x, y, {action="callback", target="cb_explode"}) end end end
function draw_score () local a = floor (score / 12) local b = score - a * 12 draw_stones ("st-glass", {0, 1}, {0, 1}, 11-a) draw_stones ("st-rock1", {0, 11}, {0, -1}, a) draw_stones ("st-glass", {19, 1}, {0, 1}, 11-b) draw_stones ("st-rock1", {19, 11}, {0, -1}, b) end
draw_score ()
function cb_uncover (onoff, sender) local x, y = enigma.GetPos (sender) enigma.KillItem (x, y)
if winnable == 1 then score = score - 1 draw_score () end
if score == 0 then for n = 1, 8 do enigma.KillItem (xx[n], yy[n]) oxyd (xx[n], yy[n]) end oxyd_shuffle () end end
function cb_explode (onoff, sender) for n = 1, mines do enigma.KillItem (xx[n], yy[n]) local bomb = set_item ("it-blackbomb", xx[n], yy[n]) SendMessage (bomb, "explode") end
if score > 0 then winnable = 0 document (1, 7, "text4") end end
function unopened_at (i, j) if mine_map[i][j] == 1 then return false end local it = enigma.GetItem (i+2, j+0) return (it ~= nil and enigma.GetKind (it) == "it-trigger") end
-- hint mechanism draw_stones ("st-rock1", {27, 5}, {1, 0}, 6) draw_stones ("st-rock1", {27, 7}, {1, 0}, 6) set_stone ("st-rock1", 32, 6) set_stone ("st-timeswitch", 31, 6, {delay=10.0, action="callback", target="cb_hint"}) doorv (27, 6, {name="door1"}) SendMessage ("door1", "open") document (29, 6, "text3")
function cb_hint (onoff) if onoff == 1 then SendMessage ("door1", "close") else SendMessage ("door1", "open") if score > 0 then local k = random (1, score) local i = 0 local j = 1 for n = 1, k do repeat i = i + 1 if i > 14 then i = 1 j = j + 1 end until unopened_at (i, j) end cb_uncover (true, enigma.GetItem (i+2, j+0)) end end end

el:string.el:english: Watch out for mines! White = 0, Blue = 1, Black = 2, Red = 3, Yellow = 4, Deep Blue = 5, Deep Red = 6 ...
Hint: Mines are never located along the edges. If you still get stuck, look behind the wall!
Hit the switch to uncover one tile, but you will have to wait 10 seconds.
